data.title: Emerald Waterways
data.meta_description: You don’t need to travel abroad to experience sun, sea and sand. With our superb range of English seaside escapes.
data.text:
Emerald Waterways made their debut in 2014, bringing the next generation of river cruising to Europe. Providing a carefully crafted range of river cruises, last from 8-17 days, their fleet of ships sail throughout Europe on the Danube, Rhine, Saône and Douro rivers, and through South East Asia on the Mekong.

As part of the Scenic Group, they benefit from the expertise of the world’s leading luxury river cruise operator. This means that when you book your holiday with Emerald Waterways, you can rest assured that they have the knowledge and experience to create amazing river cruises, designed to ensure you take home the most wonderful memories.

On an Emerald Waterways river cruise, you can expect stylish and spacious ships, designed to ensure the most comfortable journey. What you wouldn’t have expected is a brand new fleet, custom-built to offer more space per guest than most other operators and to incorporate many spectacular ship innovations, unique to river cruising.

There are few better ways to explore a destination than by cruise. Here are some of our cruise specialists’ favourite reasons to book an Emerald Waterways cruise.

Exceptional Value

At Emerald Waterways, all your delicious meals, wonderful onshore experiences, and travel and transfers within Europe are included in the price of your holiday.

On average, their cabins are larger than most other companies, but they don’t charge more for the extra space; in fact, they charge you less. Plus, you’ll be among the first to experience many spectacular ship innovations – including an onboard swimming pool that inventively converts into a cinema, and a revolutionary open-air system that allows you to enjoy your balcony, whatever the weather.

It’s amazing what’s included!

Return flights from up to 15 UK airports. All airport transfers to and from your ship for your convenience.

Spectacular ship innovations like an onboard pool and cinema, and an innovative open-air system in all cabins on the Vista and Horizon decks

A river view from all staterooms and suites

All meals and a collection of excellent highlight dinners at Reflections Restaurant

Complimentary wine, beer and soft drinks to accompany lunch and dinner

An included shore excursion on almost every cruise day

The option to have continental breakfast served in the Owner’s One-bedroom and Grand Balcony Suites

Pre-dinner canapés and after-dinner sweet treats served in the Owner’s One-bedroom and Grand Balcony Suites

Knowledgeable local guides at each destination

Complimentary WiFi on-board the ship

All port charges, airport taxes and transfer costs

PLUS they take care of all tips, saving you up to £440 per couple on 15-day cruises

Your retreat on the river

From their staterooms to their one-bedroom suites, they offer a great range of cabins to choose from. Compared to others on the river, the Emerald Staterooms are among the largest of their kind – offering more space and greater value for money.

Exceptional spaces to enhance your experience

The moment you step on board your ship, you’ll be met with an overwhelming sense of light and space. The Horizon Bar and Lounge features floor-to-ceiling windows, designed to create the most amazing airy atmosphere. And if you walk through the lounge you’ll find The Terrace looking out onto the river. Lined with the most comfortable lounge chairs, the Sun Deck offers amazing 360° views of the ever-changing scenery.
